# KOOK Open API v3 endpoints for auto-generated API.
#
# Format: <name> <method> <path>

getGuildList GET /guild/list
getGuildView GET /guild/view
getGuildUserList GET /guild/user-list
setGuildUserNickname POST /guild/nickname
leaveGuild POST /guild/leave
kickoutGuildUser POST /guild/kickout
getGuildMuteList GET /guild-mute/list
createGuildMute POST /guild-mute/create
deleteGuildMute POST /guild-mute/delete
getGuildBoostHistory GET /guild-boost/history

getChannelList GET /channel/list
getChannelView GET /channel/view
createChannel POST /channel/create
updateChannel POST /channel/update
deleteChannel POST /channel/delete
getChannelUserList GET /channel/user-list
kickChannelUser POST /channel/kickout
moveChannelUser POST /channel/move-user
getChannelRoleIndex GET /channel-role/index
syncChannelRole POST /channel-role/sync
createChannelRole POST /channel-role/create
updateChannelRole POST /channel-role/update
deleteChannelRole POST /channel-role/delete

getMessageList GET /message/list
getMessageView GET /message/view
getMessageReactionList GET /message/reaction-list
addMessageReaction POST /message/add-reaction
deleteMessageReaction POST /message/delete-reaction
sendPipeMessage POST /message/send-pipemsg
sendMessage POST /message/create
updateMessage POST /message/update
deleteMessage POST /message/delete

createAsset POST /asset/create

getUserJoinedChannelList GET /channel-user/get-joined-channel

getPrivateChatList GET /user-chat/list
getPrivateChatView GET /user-chat/view
createPrivateChat POST /user-chat/create
deletePrivateChat POST /user-chat/delete

getDirectMessageList GET /direct-message/list
createDirectMessage POST /direct-message/create
getDirectMessageView GET /direct-message/view
updateDirectMessage POST /direct-message/update
deleteDirectMessage POST /direct-message/delete
getDirectMessageReactionList GET /direct-message/reaction-list
addDirectMessageReaction POST /direct-message/add-reaction
deleteDirectMessageReaction POST /direct-message/delete-reaction

getGateway GET /gateway/index

getUserMe GET /user/me
getUserView GET /user/view
offline POST /user/offline
online POST /user/online
getOnlineStatus GET /user/get-online-status

joinVoice POST /voice/join
listJoinedVoice GET /voice/list
leaveVoice POST /voice/leave
keepVoiceAlive POST /voice/keep-alive

getGuildRoleList GET /guild-role/list
createGuildRole POST /guild-role/create
updateGuildRole POST /guild-role/update
deleteGuildRole POST /guild-role/delete
grantGuildRole POST /guild-role/grant
revokeGuildRole POST /guild-role/revoke

getIntimacy GET /intimacy/index
updateIntimacy POST /intimacy/update

getGuildEmojiList GET /guild-emoji/list
updateGuildEmoji POST /guild-emoji/update
deleteGuildEmoji POST /guild-emoji/delete

getInviteList GET /invite/list
createInvite POST /invite/create
deleteInvite POST /invite/delete

getBlacklist GET /blacklist/list
createBlacklist POST /blacklist/create
deleteBlacklist POST /blacklist/delete

getGuildBadge GET /badge/guild
getGameList GET /game
createGame POST /game/create
updateGame POST /game/update
deleteGame POST /game/delete
createGameActivity POST /game/activity
deleteGameActivity POST /game/delete-activity

getTemplateList GET /template/list
createTemplate POST /template/create
